The Birth Story of Akitti
“Seeing Akitti in meditation,
Sakka, lord of beings, said:
‘For what are you aspiring, great brahmā,
that you meditate alone in the forest?’
“‘Rebirth is suffering, Sakka,
and the breaking up of the body;
Death through confusion is suffering,
that’s why I meditate, Vāsava.’
“In response to your well-spoken words,
which are fitting and appropriate,
I’ll grant you a boon, Kassapa,
whatever you wish for in your mind.”
